pages.text: A $(item)Music Disc$() can be played on a $(l:useables/jukebox)$(item)Jukebox$(), by holding the disc and pressing the use control on the $(l:useables/jukebox)$(item)Jukebox$(), or by using a $(l:redstone/redstone_components#hopper)$(item)Hopper$() or a $(l:redstone/redstone_components#dropper)$(item)Dropper$() facing toward the $(l:useables/jukebox)$(item)Jukebox$(). $(br2)Pressing use on the $(l:useables/jukebox)$(item)Jukebox$() again ejects the disc and stops any music playing.
